properties.name: mywild.jwt.access-token-duration
properties.description: The number of minutes the JWT access token is valid for.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.refresh-token-duration
properties.description: The number of minutes the JWT refresh token is valid for.

properties.name: mywild.key.private
properties.description: The private key used by the JWT token.

properties.name: mywild.key.public
properties.description: The public key used by the JWT token.

properties.name: mywild.wildevents.page-size
properties.description: How many records to return per page for paginated queries.

properties.name: mywild.wildevents.max-activities-per-event
properties.description: How many Activities can be added to an Event.

properties.name: mywild.wildevents.max-inat-results-per-activity
properties.description: How many iNaturalist Observations can be fetched to calculate an Activity.

properties.name: mywild.wildevents.max-activity-steps
properties.description: The maximum number of steps allowed per Activity.
